author: jdcasey
msg: Adding read/writeSettings() api to the maven-tools and the embedder along with unit tests in each place, and adding a cache object for the settings that is based on the build-context.

author: ehatcher
msg: respects the schema.xml <solrQueryParser defaultOperator="..."/> setting.  Before, only
SolrQueryParser itself now sets the default operator based on the schema setting, and is overridden
with the q.op param when the latter QueryParsing.parseQuery() method is used.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Added one more missing @DataType annotation to the helloworldwsOM sample. Test case in helloworldwsOMclient is now passing.
